short_summary: Supply and delivery of White Light End Point Detector
description: Requirement for White Light End Point Detector upgrade to support expansion of fabrication activities and to align with environmental stewardship objectives.",
full_summary:
=====================================

**Solicitation Notice**
-------------------------

### **National Research Council Canada**
#### **Notice Title**: White Light End Point Detector ACAN
#### **Tender Reference Number**: 23-58209
#### **Closing Date**: February 21, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

**Pre-qualified Supplier**
---------------------------

The National Research Council Canada invites statements of capabilities from pre-qualified suppliers for the upgrade of the SPTS i2L055 white light End Point Detector System.

**Purpose**
------------

This project is aimed at supporting and expanding fabrication activities, while aligning with the environmental stewardship objectives of the National Research Council Canada. The delivery of the system is required in Ottawa, Ontario.

**Security Requirements**
-------------------------

This solicitation includes security requirements.

**Applicable Trade Agreements**
-------------------------------

*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Notice Requirements and Deliverables**
-----------------------------------------

To ensure response before the closing date, suppliers must submit written statements of capabilities, identifying their full qualifications, suitability, and availability to provide the required goods, services, or construction services.

**Inquiries**
--------------

All inquiries about this requirement must be submitted in writing to the contracting authority at least five calendar days prior to the closing date.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

*   Shawn Doyle, Procurement Officer
    *   Finance and Procurement Services Directorate
    *   National Research Council Canada
    *   Telephone: (343) 551-3688
    *   Email: <Shawn.Doyle@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca>

**Document Attachments**
-------------------------

Please refer to the following document attachments for detailed information:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/31388/23-58209---acan.pdf (English)
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/31388/23-58209---pac.pdf (French)

Conflict of interest
---------------------

No conflict of interest was disclosed in this solicitation. 

Hope this assist you in obtaining the necessary information. Have a good day!
Best regards
<\your name>
